tool_description: An automated bot that posts cat pictures from selected subreddits every third hour. Besides that, you can fetch the previously posted data through the API.
name: Cat API
title: Cat API

api_list.name: Previous Posts With Date Filter
api_list.description:
1. Your URL should look like this if you are filtering the posted data by date: -

https://catktorapi.onrender.com/previousPosts/{DATE}

2. Replace **{DATE}** with the date you want to retrieve data from.

>  As an example, retriving the data from the date October 26, 2022 looks like this:-

https://catktorapi.onrender.com/previousPosts/26OCTOBER2022

api_list.name: Previous Posts
api_list.description: Returns the previously posted data by the bot in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cat-api5.p.rapidapi.com/previousPosts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cat-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cat-api5.p.rapidapi.com/previousPosts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cat-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
